attributes.action: Offer sanctuary in the UK for people wanting to leave Afghanistan.
attributes.additional_details: To offer the people of Afghanistan a future in which their human rights are valued and protected. With military interventions now withdawn from this area, we can avert the ongoing cycle of terror by offering safe sanctuary in the UK for people of Afghanistan not wanting to live in Taliban rule.
attributes.background: Avert a humanitarian disaster by offering sanctuary in the UK for people in Afghanistan wanting to leave.  This can be given a limited time window and will enable people whose values are not in alignment with the Taliban to leave Afghanistan safely and swiftly, with a safe route to the UK.

rejection.details:
The Home Office announced on 18 August 2021 a bespoke resettlement route for Afghan refugees who have been forced to flee the country. You can read more about it on the gov.uk website: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/bespoke-resettlement-route-for-afghan-refugees-announced

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Help the people of Afghanistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823
